message.content:
Search for AI music generation applications that allow users to upload their own songs or audio files. Focus on tools that can:
1. Accept uploaded audio/songs as input
2. Generate music based on or with uploaded content
3. Are currently available in 2026
4. Have good reviews and active user base

Search broadly and compile a list with key features, pricing, and capabilities. Include both free and paid options.

Based on the web search results, here's what I found about music generation tools that accept user songs input in 2026:

## Tools That Accept User Input

Musicful allows you to upload or hum a melody to guide the AI, making it useful for those who want to build on their own musical ideas.

Some platforms provide custom lyrics support, allowing users to input their own lyrics for AI to transform into complete songs rather than only generating from descriptions.

## Common Input Methods

Most modern music generation tools accept various forms of user input:

- Users can input prompts specifying musical styles, moods, or instruments and receive AI-generated songs within seconds
- Tools like Amadeus Code produce melodies and music based on consumer input and choices, where users can input musical parameters such as mood, pace, and style
- Voice cloning capability is available in some tools, which replicates uploaded voices for personalized songs

## Notable 2026 Tools

Platforms like Suno, Udio, and AIVA produce professional-quality output suitable for commercial releases. These tools generally accept text prompts and other user inputs to generate music, though the search results show more emphasis on text-based prompts and parameters rather than uploading existing complete songs.

Based on the search results, here are several AI remix generator tools that allow you to upload audio files:

## Popular AI Remix Generators

**Fadr** - Produces remixes and mashups with your songs, allows you to change key and tempo, with Fadr AI handling synchronization.

**Covers.ai** - You can upload a song, select a new voice or style, and let the AI create a fresh remix for you.

**Loudly** - Simply upload your audio (MP3, WAV, stems), choose from 50+ genre styles, and let the online song remixer instantly generate a new version. Loudly includes real-time stem separation, meaning it can isolate vocals, drums, bass, and instruments perfectly.

**RiffGen** - Upload any audio file - original songs, covers, or existing tracks you want to transform, select your target genre or style, and the AI will analyze and transform the musical elements accordingly.

**StockmusicGPT** - Upload your own audio file or choose a song that you previously generated to proceed.

**Tuney** - Type an idea or upload any audio file to generate results. Tuney's AI models are trained on music theory and understand how to assemble audio clips into finished songs, including your uploaded audio.

**Media.io** - Supports MP3, M4A, OGG, AU, MP4, MOV, VOB, MTS, and other formats for remixing.

Most of these tools offer user-friendly interfaces where you upload your audio, select a genre or style, and the AI generates remix variations in seconds.

Based on the search results, here's comprehensive information about Udio AI music generator:

## Pricing Plans

Udio offers three pricing plans: a Free plan, a Standard plan ($10/month), and a Pro plan ($30/month).

**Free Plan:**
Includes 10 daily creation credits, access to full song generation, audio/video exports, and access to the Song Feed.

**Standard Plan ($10/month):**
Includes all Free features, audio uploads, song editing, style reduction/negative prompting, high-quality WAV & stem exports, more monthly credits, and the ability to create more songs at the same time.

**Pro Plan ($30/month):**
Includes everything in Standard, early access to new features & models, more monthly credits, and the ability to create more songs at the same time.

## Key Features

**Audio Upload Capability:**
Users can upload audio files to guide the tempo and mood of their music creation.

**Music Generation & Editing:**
Songs are created based on text prompts, which can include genre, lyrics, story direction, and artists to base their sound on. Songs are first generated as roughly 30 second-long pieces, and can be extended by additional 30 second increments.

**Advanced Features:**
Paying subscribers can access advanced functionality such as audio inpainting, and users can edit the lyrics of vocal tracks, specifying exactly what they want the AI to sing.

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Suno AI's pricing and features for 2026:

## Pricing Plans

Suno offers a free plan with 50 credits per day (roughly 10 songs), and a Pro plan at $10 per month providing 2,500 credits per month (approximately 500 songs). For serious creators, the Premier plan is approximately $24 per month and grants access to 10,000 monthly credits along with priority support.

Suno also offers flexible yearly pricing plans that allow users to save 20% on their subscription fees. Annual plans cost as low as $7.30/month when billed yearly, while quarterly options are $11.60/month.

## Key Features

The latest version, Suno v5, delivers studio-quality audio (the same as CDs), supports songs up to 8 minutes long, and includes pro editing tools where you can split songs into 12 different parts, like separating vocals from instruments.

Suno is a platform that empowers users to create original songs using artificial intelligence by entering a simple text prompt to generate full tracks that include lyrics, vocals, and musical arrangements.

## Commercial Use

The free plan has a catch where Suno owns songs you make and you can't sell or use them for business; however, paid plans allow you to own the music and use it however you want, including for commercial purposes.

## Pricing Plans

Suno offers a free plan with 50 credits per day (roughly 10 songs), and a Pro plan at $10 per month providing 2,500 credits per month (approximately 500 songs). For serious creators, the Premier plan is approximately $24 per month and grants access to 10,000 monthly credits along with priority support.

Suno also offers flexible yearly pricing plans that allow users to save 20% on their subscription fees. Annual plans cost as low as $7.30/month when billed yearly, while quarterly options are $11.60/month.

## Key Features

The latest version, Suno v5, delivers studio-quality audio (the same as CDs), supports songs up to 8 minutes long, and includes pro editing tools where you can split songs into 12 different parts, like separating vocals from instruments.

Suno is a platform that empowers users to create original songs using artificial intelligence by entering a simple text prompt to generate full tracks that include lyrics, vocals, and musical arrangements.

## Commercial Use

The free plan has a catch where Suno owns songs you make and you can't sell or use them for business; however, paid plans allow you to own the music and use it however you want, including for commercial purposes.

Based on the web search results, here's comprehensive information about AIVA AI music generator:

## Overview

AIVA (Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist) is an AI music generation assistant that helps beginners, pro users, and businesses create copyright-free compositions.

## Features

AIVA allows you to create your own style models, upload an audio or MIDI influence, edit your generated tracks, and download in any file format.(no content)AIVA offers more than 250 styles, including Electronic, Pop, Ambient, Modern Cinematic, Folk Rock, Jazz Lounge, Sea Shanty, Piano Solo, Fantasy, Tango, Chinese, and more.

### Audio/MIDI Upload
AIVA allows you to upload your own audio or MIDI to create custom style models and influence compositions. More specifically, you can upload an existing audio or MIDI file, and AIVA will generate a new, original composition that captures the core musical characteristics of the reference track.

### Export Formats
AIVA supports MP3, Orchestrated MIDI, Reduced MIDI, 16-bit & 48 kHz uncompressed WAV files.

## Pricing Plans

AIVA offers three tiers with different capabilities:

- **Free Plan**: 3 downloads per month and up to 3 minutes per track
- **Standard Plan**: 15 downloads per month and up to 5 minutes per track
- **Pro Plan**: 300 downloads per month and up to 5 minutes 30 seconds per track(no content)It offers a 15% discount on monthly plans and a 30% discount on annual plans for students and educators.

## Copyright & Licensing

Only Pro Plan users own the full copyright. Free and Standard plan compositions remain under AIVA's copyright.

Based on the search results, here's what I found about MusicGen's upload audio input features:

## MusicGen Audio Upload Features

MusicGen's interface includes an audio upload container alongside a text area and output container for generated music.(no content)Meta offers audio upload features with better controls over generated output compared to prior work.

### Melody Conditioning

MusicGen's melody conditioning feature allows you to upload reference audio that guides the melodic and harmonic structure of the generated music.(no content)You can upload a short audio file, such as a hummed melody, a piano key, or even a whistle, and MusicGen will use it as a foundation to create a new track.

### Technical Specifications

MusicGen explores melody-guided generation based on chromagrams, extracting the main melody from a music sample using features that capture harmonic and melodic characteristics, which are then used to guide generation while staying faithful to the provided text description.

### Audio Input Requirements

For best results with melody conditioning, choose reference audio that features clear, recognizable melodies without background noise or distortion, keeping clips between 15-30 seconds long and focusing on simple instrumental or vocal melodies.

### Duration Limitations

MusicGen generation is limited to 30 second inputs, and input audio passed by Audio-Prompted Generation contributes to this limit, so given an input of 20 seconds of audio, MusicGen cannot generate more than 10 seconds of additional audio.

Perfect! Now I have comprehensive information. Let me compile this into a well-organized list for the user.

## Comprehensive List of AI Music Generation Tools with Audio Upload Capabilities (2026)

Based on my research, here's a detailed compilation of AI music generation applications that accept uploaded audio files and can generate music based on user content:

---

### **PREMIUM TIER TOOLS**

#### **1. Suno**
**Website:** [suno.com](https://suno.com/home)
**Upload Capability:** Record or upload audio to personalize music generation
**Key Features:**
- Generate full songs (up to 8 minutes) with lyrics, vocals, and arrangements
- Studio-quality audio output (CD quality)
- Advanced editing with song splitting into 12 parts (vocals, instruments, etc.)
- Creates original songs from text prompts or uploaded reference audio
- Available on mobile and desktop apps

**Pricing:**
- Free: 50 credits/day (approximately 10 songs)
- Pro: $10/month (2,500 credits/month, ~500 songs)
- Premier: $24/month (10,000 credits/month)
- Annual savings: 20% discount on monthly rates

**Commercial Use:** Free plan doesn't allow commercial use; paid plans grant full ownership and commercial rights
**User Base:** Large active community with professional-quality output

---

#### **2. Udio**
**Website:** [udio.com](https://www.udio.com/)
**Upload Capability:** Upload audio files to guide tempo and mood
**Key Features:**
- Audio upload to influence generation style
- Song editing and audio inpainting
- Extends songs in 30-second increments
- High-quality WAV and stem exports
- Lyric editing for vocal tracks
- Style reduction and negative prompting

**Pricing:**
- Free: 10 daily creation credits with audio/video export
- Standard: $10/month (includes audio upload, more monthly credits)
- Pro: $30/month (early feature access, premium monthly credits)

**User Base:** Growing platform with professional composers and creators

---

#### **3. AIVA**
**Website:** [aiva.ai](https://www.aiva.ai/)
**Upload Capability:** Upload audio or MIDI to create custom style models
**Key Features:**
- 250+ music styles available
- Upload reference tracks to influence composition
- Edit and customize generated tracks
- Multiple export formats (MP3, WAV, MIDI)
- Custom style model creation
- Emotional soundtrack generation

**Pricing:**
- Free: 3 downloads/month, up to 3 minutes per track
- Standard: 15 downloads/month, up to 5 minutes per track
- Pro: 300 downloads/month, up to 5:30 per track
- Student discount: 15-30% off

**Commercial Use:** Only Pro plan users own full copyright
**User Base:** Popular with game developers and film composers

---

### **REMIX & STEM SEPARATION SPECIALISTS**

#### **4. Fadr**
**Website:** [fadr.com](https://fadr.com/)
**Upload Capability:** Upload songs for remixing and stem separation
**Key Features:**
- 16-stem track splitting (vocals, drums, bass, guitar, piano, strings, etc.)
- AI remixer creates club-ready edits, mashups, tempo changes
- SynthGPT plugin (creates melodic instruments from text)
- DrumGPT plugin (creates drum kits from text)
- DJ performance mode with real-time transitions and mashups
- Unlimited usage on free plan for most features

**Pricing:**
- Basic (Free): Unlimited stems, remixes, DJ sets, high-quality MP3 downloads
- Plus: $10/month or $100/year (individual drum separation, Stems Plugin, WAV downloads, pro features)

**User Base:** 95% of services available free; popular with producers and DJs
**Reviews:** User-friendly interface praised for both hobbyists and professionals

---

#### **5. Loudly**
**Website:** [loudly.com](https://www.loudly.com/ai-song-remixer)
**Upload Capability:** Upload MP3, WAV, or stems for remixing
**Key Features:**
- 50+ genre style remixing options
- Automatic stem separation (isolate vocals, drums, bass, instruments)
- Real-time tempo and key detection
- Generate remix packs with all audio materials
- Export directly to DAWs (Ableton, Logic Pro, FL Studio, Pro Tools, Cubase)
- 100% royalty-free output

**Pricing:**
- Free: Up to 3 downloads, basic MP3 quality, 0.5-minute previews
- Paid plans available (specific pricing to be confirmed on website)

**User Base:** Favored by producers for high-accuracy stem separation and professional output

---

#### **6. RiffGen**
**Website:** [riffgen.com](https://www.riffgen.com/remixer-ai)
**Upload Capability:** Upload any audio file for genre/style transformation
**Key Features:**
- Convert between any musical genres
- Automatic tempo and key adjustment
- Instrument replacement with genre-appropriate alternatives
- Intelligent vocal processing and adaptation
- Multiple remix variations
- Individual instrument extraction

**Pricing:** Specific pricing not detailed in search results (check website)
**User Base:** Growing platform for genre transformation and remixing

---

#### **7. Covers.ai**
**Website:** [covers.ai](https://covers.ai/generator?type=remix)
**Upload Capability:** Upload songs for AI remix generation
**Key Features:**
- AI remix generator with voice/style selection
- Convert songs to different styles and artists
- Fresh remix generation from uploaded tracks

**Pricing:** Free with optional upgrades (check website)

---

### **SPECIALIZED TOOLS**

#### **8. MusicGen (Meta)**
**Website:** [audiocraft.metademolab.com/musicgen.html](https://audiocraft.metademolab.com/musicgen.html)
**Upload Capability:** Upload audio for melody conditioning
**Key Features:**
- Melody-guided generation using audio reference
- Chromagram-based melody extraction
- Text prompt combined with audio input
- Clear melodic structure from uploaded audio
- Open-source model available

**Pricing:** Free (Meta's open-source model)
**User Base:** Technical users, researchers, developers

**Audio Input Requirements:**
- Clear, recognizable melodies (minimal background noise)
- Clips: 15-30 seconds optimal
- Focus on instrumental or vocal melodies
- Limitations: 30-second total output per generation (includes input audio time)

---

#### **9. Singify**
**Website:** [singify.fineshare.com](https://singify.fineshare.com/)
**Upload Capability:** Upload audio/video as reference for synthesis
**Key Features:**
- Multiple input methods (text, lyrics, images, video, audio)
- AI synthesis of original melodies, harmonies, and vocals
- Up to 4-4.5 minute songs
- Multiple AI models and singer options
- Music styles: EDM, Hip Hop, Pop, Jazz, etc.
- High-quality MP3 and FLAC export

**Pricing:** Free option available with potential paid upgrades
**User Base:** Good for custom vocal synthesis and style-based generation

---

#### **10. Beatoven.ai**
**Website:** [beatoven.ai](https://www.beatoven.ai/)
**Upload Capability:** Upload content (video, podcast) or existing track
**Key Features:**
- 8 genre options for content
- 16 mood selections
- Adjustable duration, intensity, tempo, BPM
- Generate from text descriptions
- MP3 and WAV export
- Fully licensed music model with artist payouts

**Pricing:**
- Free tier available
- Standard: $20/month
- Premium: $50/month
- Starting at: $2.50/month

**Important Restrictions:** Cannot distribute directly on music streaming platforms (Spotify, Apple Music)
**Licensing:** Non-exclusive perpetual license, royalty-free

---

### **ADDITIONAL MENTIONED TOOLS**

#### **11. MakeBestMusic**
**Website:** [makebestmusic.com](https://makebestmusic.com)
**Upload Capability:** Upload music files for element extraction and remixing
**Key Features:**
- Split Music feature to extract vocals, drums, and other elements
- AI-powered music generation and customization

---

#### **12. Musicful**
**Website:** [musicful.ai](https://www.musicful.ai/)
**Upload Capability:** Upload melody or hum to guide generation
**Key Features:**
- Melody-based music creation
- Customizable music generation based on user input

**Best for Full Song Generation:** Suno and Udio lead with professional-quality output and strong audio upload features.

**Best Free Options:** Fadr (95% free), MusicGen (completely free), and several with generous free tiers.

**Best for Audio Remixing:** Fadr, Loudly, and RiffGen specialize in this with advanced stem separation.
